original: dag @#/_/dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod🔽pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: dag @#/_/dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
translated: Praise of the Glorious Black Goddess🔽In Sanskrit: Śrī-Kali-Devi-Stotra

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri ka li de wi stod tra na ma/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri ka li de wi stod tra na ma/_bod skad du/
translated: In Tibetan: Dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba

original: dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_ma bcos chos sku bde ba chen po ni//
analyzed: dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_ma bcos chos sku bde ba chen po ni//
translated: The uncontrived dharmakāya of great bliss

original: srid dang zhi bar mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang /_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
analyzed: srid dang zhi bar mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang /_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
translated: Does not abide in existence or peace, but is the state of equality.🔽Supreme enlightened body, speech, mind, qualities,🔽and activity,

original: 'phrin las mchog_/dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mo khyod la bstod/_/sku'i dkyil
analyzed: 'phrin las mchog_/dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mo khyod la bstod/_/sku'i dkyil
translated: I praise you, glorious goddess.🔽The maṇḍala of enlightened body is equal to the dharmadhātu,

original: 'khor chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam/_/mya ngan mi 'da' 'thun par snang ba nyid//
analyzed: 'khor chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam/_/mya ngan mi 'da' 'thun par snang ba nyid//
translated: Not transcending suffering, but appearing in accordance with those to be tamed.🔽The sole beautiful ornament, Rematī,

original: mdzes pa'i rgyan cha ma cig re ma ti/_/'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ma la bdag bstod
analyzed: mdzes pa'i rgyan cha ma cig re ma ti/_/'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ma la bdag bstod
translated: I praise you, sole friend of migrators.🔽The wisdom of the dharmakāya, pure like the sky,

original: do/_/chos sku mkha' ltar dag pa'i shes rab ma/_/longs sku bde chen rmad
analyzed: do/_/chos sku mkha' ltar dag pa'i shes rab ma/_/longs sku bde chen rmad
translated: With the method of the marvelous great bliss of the saṃbhogakāya,

original: byung thabs tshhul gyis/_/ma rungs gdug pa can rnams tshhar gcod pa'i/_/mi
analyzed: byung thabs tshhul gyis/_/ma rungs gdug pa can rnams tshhar gcod pa'i/_/mi
translated: You annihilate all vicious, evil ones.

original: bsnyel thugs rje can la bdag bstod do/_/dman pa mi 'dor rtags su bong bu
analyzed: bsnyel thugs rje can la bdag bstod do/_/dman pa mi 'dor rtags su bong bu
translated: You do not abandon the lowly, as shown by your donkey🔽form,🔽You are the god of gods, who terrifies the demigods,🔽You are the nirmāṇakāya who wanders in a thousand

original: phyibs/_/lha'i lhar gyur lha min skrag mdzad ma/_/sprul sku'i rdzu 'phrul stong
analyzed: phyibs/_/lha'i lhar gyur lha min skrag mdzad ma/_/sprul sku'i rdzu 'phrul stong

original: gsum khyab par nyul/_/bstan pa'i gnyer mdzad ma la bdag bstod do/_/
analyzed: gsum khyab par nyul/_/bstan pa'i gnyer mdzad ma la bdag bstod do/_/
translated: I praise you, who cares for the teachings.

original: dpal ldan lha mo mi 'gyur thugs rje can/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod
analyzed: dpal ldan lha mo mi 'gyur thugs rje can/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod
translated: Glorious goddess, unchanging and compassionate,🔽accept this offering torma of your blessings,

original: gtor 'di bzhes la/_/rnal 'byor bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrubs/_/🔽bstan pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus med par mdzod/_/ces lha ma srin gyis bstod
analyzed: gtor 'di bzhes la/_/rnal 'byor bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrubs/_/ bstan pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus med par mdzod/_/ces lha ma srin gyis bstod
translated: and accomplish the wishes of this yogi.🔽Destroy without exception the enemies and obstructors of the teachings.

original: pa/_la li ta badzra dang gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: pa/_la li ta badzra dang gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: This praise of the goddess by the devas and rākṣasas was translated by Lalitavajra and G.yung Dbu-dkar.
